description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=1/3, Mature Content=1/3. Quizocalypse is a quiz game with zombies! Got brainz? Because they are hungry. Choose your zombie - Lickin' Lou, Zealous Zoe, Billy the Brain or Friendly Frank - and compete for massive amouts of delicious brain. You will only get it, if you get the answers right. And the questions are all about the nerdy, geeky and trashy stuff.
description.short: Quizocalypse is a quiz game with zombies! Got brainz? Because they are hungry. Choose your zombie - Lickin' Lou, Zealous Zoe, Billy the Brain or Friendly Frank - and compete for massive amouts of delicious brain. You will only get it, if you get the answers right. And the questions are all about the nerdy, geeky and trashy stuff.
